name: HypeSaints
introduce: HypeSaints is a Web3 on-chain gameboy ecological product. It will introduce gameboy NFT and NFS (Non-Fungible Story) to boost user experience, profit, and creativity. NFS will be “On-chain Story Cassettes”, which users can purchase, experience, sale and rent. Engaging with the interactive content and gameplay embedded in NFS, users will obtain immersive experience and earn tokens that can be consumed in the interaction with ‘Story Cassettes’ or for more. Its mission is to provide millions of users with blockchain-powered immersive entertainment ecology.
